languages.text: "И все же ни отдых, ни наше с тобой примирение не в силах заглушить смятение моей души. Крударах утерян, мы в западне, а истина по-прежнему сокрыта во тьме. Что стало с моими собратьями? Что стало с моим миром? И почему темный кузен рассказал меньше, чем знает". {n}Изумрудный взгляд темнеет, проникая, кажется, в глубины души.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И все же ни отдых, ни целебные мази, ни наше с тобой примирение, элантах, не в силах заглушить смятение моей души. Крударах утерян, а бутон истины так и не раскрылся передо мной. Что стало с моими собратьями? Что стало с моим миром? И почему темный кузен рассказал меньше, чем знает". {n}Изумрудный взгляд темнеет, проникая, кажется, в глубины души.{/n}

"И все же ни отдых, ни наше с тобой примирение не в силах заглушить смятение моей души. Крударах утерян, мы в западне, а истина по-прежнему сокрыта во тьме. Что стало с моими собратьями? Что стало с моим миром? И почему темный кузен рассказал меньше, чем знает". {n}Изумрудный взгляд темнеет, проникая, кажется, в глубины души.{/n}

languages.text: "And yet neither rest nor healing salves or even our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul, elantach. Crudarach is lost, and the bud of truth never opened before me. What happened to my kinsmen? What happened to my world? And why did the dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И все же ни отдых, ни наше с тобой примирение не в силах заглушить смятение моей души. Крударах утерян, мы в западне, а истина по-прежнему сокрыта во тьме. Что стало с моими собратьями? Что стало с моим миром? И почему темный кузен рассказал меньше, чем знает". {n}Изумрудный взгляд темнеет, проникая, кажется, в глубины души.{/n}

What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

languages.text: “然而，无论是休息，还是连我们之间的和解，都无法抚平我灵魂中可怕的激荡。克鲁达拉赫失落了，我们被困在了这里，而真相却依然躲着我，与之前别无二致。我的族人究竟遭遇了什么事情？我的世界究竟遭遇了什么事情？还有，我那位阴暗的表亲，为什么不肯对我和盘托出？”{n}伊莉耶特绿宝石般的双眼中涌动着咆哮的黑暗，似乎想探寻你的灵魂最深处的部分。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet neither rest nor our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul. Crudarach is lost, we are trapped, and the truth remains as hidden from me as ever it was. What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “然而，无论是休息还是疗伤的药膏，甚至就连我们之间的和解，也无法抚平我灵魂中可怕的激荡，外界人。克鲁达拉赫失落了，真理的花蕾从未在我面前绽放过。我的族人究竟遭遇了什么事情？我的世界究竟遭遇了什么事情？还有，我那位阴暗的表亲，为什么不肯对我和盘托出？”{n}伊莉耶特绿宝石般的双眼中涌动着咆哮的黑暗，似乎想探寻你的灵魂最深处的部分。{/n}

languages.original_text: "And yet neither rest nor our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul. Crudarach is lost, we are trapped, and the truth remains as hidden from me as ever it was. What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

languages.text: «Y, aun así, ni el descanso ni nuestra reconciliación pueden apaciguar el brutal tormento de mi alma. Crudarach está perdido, nosotros estamos atrapados y la verdad me está tan oculta como antes. ¿Qué les ocurrió a mis hermanos? ¿Qué fue de mi mundo? ¿Y por qué mi primo oscuro no quiso contarme todo lo que sabía?». {n}En los ojos esmeralda de Yrliet, una oscuridad turbulenta parece examinar las profundidades de tu alma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet neither rest nor our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul. Crudarach is lost, we are trapped, and the truth remains as hidden from me as ever it was. What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y, aun así, ni el descanso, ni los bálsamos curativos ni nuestra reconciliación pueden apaciguar el brutal tormento de mi alma, elantach. Crudarach ya no existe, y la flor de la verdad nunca se abrió ante mí. ¿Qué les ocurrió a mis hermanos? ¿Qué fue de mi mundo? ¿Y por qué mi primo oscuro no quiso contarme todo lo que sabía?». {n}En los ojos esmeralda de Yrliet, una oscuridad turbulenta parece examinar las profundidades de tu alma.{/n}

languages.text: 「しかし、休息も和解も、この魂の激しい動揺を鎮めてはくれない。クルダラはなくなり、私達は捕らわれて、真実は今までと変わらず姿を潜めたまま。同族に何が起きた？私の世界に何が起きた？そして、なぜ我が闇のいとこは知っている事を隠して話す？」{n}ユリエットのエメラルドの瞳には闇が渦巻き、こちらの魂の底まで探られているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet neither rest nor our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul. Crudarach is lost, we are trapped, and the truth remains as hidden from me as ever it was. What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、休息も、癒やしの軟膏も、我らの和解でさえも、魂の荒涼とした混乱を癒すことはできない。クルダラは失われ、真実の芽は私の前に開かれることはなかった。私の同族に何が起こったのか？私の世界に何が起こったのか？そして、なぜ私の闇の同胞は、彼が知っている以上のことを私に話さなかったのだろうか？」{n}ユリエットのエメラルド色の瞳には、魂の底を探るような闇が渦巻いていた。{/n}

languages.text: "Und doch können weder Rast noch unsere Versöhnung den wilden Aufruhr in meiner Seele besänftigen. Crudarach ist verloren, wir sitzen in der Falle, und die Wahrheit bleibt mit so verborgen wie immer. Was ist mit den Meinen geschehen? Was ist mit meiner Welt geschehen? Und warum hat mein dunkler Vetter mir weniger gesagt als er wusste?" {n}In Yrliets smaragdgrünen Augen liegt eine brodelnde Dunkelheit, die die Tiefen deiner Seele abzusuchen scheint.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet neither rest nor our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul. Crudarach is lost, we are trapped, and the truth remains as hidden from me as ever it was. What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und doch können weder Rast noch heilende Salben noch unsere Versöhnung den wilden Aufruhr in meiner Seele besänftigen, Elantach. Crudarach ist verloren, und die Knospe der Wahrheit hat sich mir nie geöffnet. Was ist mit meinem Volk geschehen? Was ist mit meiner Welt geschehen? Und warum hat mein dunkler Vetter mir weniger gesagt als er wusste?" {n}In Yrliets smaragdgrünen Augen liegt eine brodelnde Dunkelheit, die die Tiefen deiner Seele abzusuchen scheint.{/n}

languages.text: « Hélas, ni le repos ni notre réconciliation ne peuvent apaiser la tourmente qui assaille mon âme. Crudarach est perdu, nous sommes {mf|piégés|piégées} ici et la vérité me reste aussi inaccessible que jamais. Qu'est-il advenu de mon peuple et de mon monde ? Et pourquoi mon ténébreux noir ne m'a-t-il pas révélé tout ce qu'il savait ? » {n}Vous voyez dans les yeux émeraude d'Yrliet une tempête de ténèbres qui semble sonder jusqu'au plus profond de votre âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet neither rest nor our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul. Crudarach is lost, we are trapped, and the truth remains as hidden from me as ever it was. What happened to my kin? What happened to my world? And why did my dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pour autant, ni le repos, ni les baumes curatifs, ni même notre réconciliation ne peuvent apaiser la tourmente qui assaille mon âme, elantach. Crudarach est perdu, et la fleur de la vérité ne s'est jamais ouverte devant moi. Qu'est-il advenu de mon peuple et de mon monde ? Et pourquoi mon cousin noir ne m'a-t-il pas révélé tout ce qu'il savait ? » {n}Vous voyez dans les yeux émeraude d'Yrliet une tempête de ténèbres qui semble sonder jusqu'au plus profond de votre âme.{/n}

languages.text: "Ancak ruhuma yer etmiş köpüren çalkantıyı ne dinlenmek ne de şifalı merhemler dindirebiliyor. Uzlaşmamız bile fayda etmiyor elantach. Crudarach'ı kaybettik, hakikat tohumu benim için hiç açmadı. Soydaşlarıma ne oldu? Dünyama ne oldu? Kara soydaşım neden tüm bildiklerini benimle paylaşmadı?" {n}Yrliet'in zümrüt yeşili gözlerinde öfkeli bir karanlık yatıyor, âdeta ruhunun derinliklerini yokluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet neither rest nor healing salves or even our reconciliation can soothe the savage turmoil in my soul, elantach. Crudarach is lost, and the bud of truth never opened before me. What happened to my kinsmen? What happened to my world? And why did the dark cousin tell me less than he knew?" {n}There is a roiling darkness in Yrliet's emerald eyes that seems to search the very bottom of your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ancak ruhuma yer eden bu hiddetli kargaşayı ne dinlenmek ne de uzlaşmamız yatıştırabiliyor. Crudarach'ı kaybettik, burada mahsur kaldık ve hakikat, kendini her zamanki gibi benden saklıyor. Soydaşlarıma ne oldu? Dünyama ne oldu? Peki karanlık kuzenim, neden tüm bildiklerini benimle paylaşmadı?" {n}Yrliet'in zümrüt yeşili gözlerinde öfkeli bir karanlık yatıyor, âdeta ruhunun derinliklerini yokluyor.{/n}

"Ancak ruhuma yer eden bu hiddetli kargaşayı ne dinlenmek ne de uzlaşmamız yatıştırabiliyor. Crudarach'ı kaybettik, burada mahsur kaldık ve hakikat, kendini her zamanki gibi benden saklıyor. Soydaşlarıma ne oldu? Dünyama ne oldu? Peki karanlık kuzenim, neden tüm bildiklerini benimle paylaşmadı?" {n}Yrliet'in zümrüt yeşili gözlerinde öfkeli bir karanlık yatıyor, âdeta ruhunun derinliklerini yokluyor.{/n}
